Desc.entry: Promotes the art of beekeeping and gives advice and assistance with honey bees. Gives a series of talks/lectures by experienced beekeepers. Also runs a beginner's course during May. Please see website for contact details.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 2nd Wed in the month (winter only, Oct-Apr, except Dec), please see website for details of summer programme, which is held at Thrybergh Country Park, Rotherham
